title: Pure Organic Moroccan Argan Oil - Soothe and Smooth Skin - Soften and Repair Fine Lines And Wrinkles On Face And Body - Reduce Scars - Improve Skin Moisture and Hydration - Strengthen and Repair Nails - Improve Hair Texture, Split Ends and Frizz - Best Cosmetic Oil - Packed with Rejuvenating Vitamins D, E and Essential Fatty Acids - Help Rebuild Collagen - Imported From Morocco - Packaged in Amber To Preserve Nutrients - No Risk - 100% Money Back Guarantee - 2 OZ. (60ml)
description: The Most Difficult Thing About Buying Silken Gold Argan Oil...Is going to be the two or three days you have to wait for your oil.When it arrives, here is what we want you to do:- Open the inner box and take out the package. Take a moment to admire the elegant organza bag it is packaged in. You may want to use this to give someone else a gift.- Remove your bottle of Silken Gold and spritz a bit on your arm or hand.- Sniff the light, slightly nutty smell. This is one of the marks of quality argan oil.- Rub it lightly into your skin. Notice how it glides on and absorbs fast, with no greasy feel.- Notice how light it feels. After a moment or two, notice how moist and smooth your skin feels. Compare it to your "un-arganed" skin.- Imagine how wonderful your face, hands and entire body will feel when you use Silken Gold regularly.- And don't forget its unique anti-inflammatory, anti-biotic and anti-aging properties, either. It is truly a multipurpose oil.Thousands of enthusiastic users around the world testify to the amazing effects of this oil on their bodies and once you give it a try, you will, too.We know our product is so good that we offer you what we call ourempty-bottle guarantee.Here it is: GiveSilken Golda fair try. If after a few weeks of regular use, you are unsatisfied, send us the bottle (even if it is empty) and we refund your money, no questions asked.Nothing to lose, and everything to gain - for your whole beautiful body.GO CLICK THE BUTTONat the top of this page to try it risk-free now. Grab a bottle for your best friend, too. She deserves it.

title: Wig Cap (2 Pack) Color Neutral
description: Manages and hides hair. Secures hair under wigs without pins. Designed to give a comfortable fit. Enables hair breathability.

title: Duo Water Proof Eyelash Adhesive, Dark Tone - 0.25 Oz
description: Duo Eyelash Adhesive, Dark Tone is eyelash with dark tone. It blends with black or brown lashes.

title: Skinny Cream Clinically Proven Cellulite Reduction, 6 Ounce
description: With its state of the art proprietary blend of potent ingredients, Skinny Cream gives you clinically proven results to reduce the appearance of cellulite, while making the body smoother and firmer. This revolutionary cream not only diminishes the appearance of cellulite while dramatically increasing the skin's smoothness, but it causes "reverse differentiation" causing fat cells and fat tissue to actually reverse its form into healthy, fibrolast-like tissue. The skin will be smoother, firmer and healthier with more suppleness and elasticity...and a dramatic reduction in the appearance of cellulite.

title: Banana Boat Summer Color Self-Tanning Lotion, Deep Dark Color, For All Skin Tones, 6-Ounce Tubes (Pack of 3)
description: Summer Color lets you control the shade of your tan. This quick-drying sunless tanning lotion from Banana Boat allows you to get the deepest, richest tan that is achievable with your skin tone. The more often you apply it, the deeper your tan becomes. After achieving your desired color, you can maintain your tan with less frequent applications for a natural-looking tan. The lotion is tinted so you can see where you've applied it for a streak-free, sunless tan. Made for deep, dark skin tone, Summer Color is oil-free and enriched with aloe vera and Vitamin E. Made in Canada.
